record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name="activitytype" and term="Activity type table" and format.name="activitytype" and syslanguage="en"
record.recordid: activitytype - Activity type table - activitytype - en
record.file.name: activitytype
record.format.name: activitytype

brief.brief: Contains records storing predetermined types of activity that you can select to describe what took place.

detail.detail: You can use Activity types to trigger other events, such as updates to the status of Incident records.

The use of activity records and activity type is an optional setting in the Incident Management environment record to keep activity records of an Incident record. You can use it in preference to paging (page list) in Incident Management.
